name: COVID DESTROYER
description:
Description:

Simple VR game where player must destroy as many viruses as possible before  being infected. This is my first 3D VR game that I made to challenge myself. Game is totally free and always will be. How many points can you get?

Story:

End of 2019. In the lab, the virus got out of control and started infecting. Your life is lost, but you can help humanity by destroying as many viruses as possible. Can You handle it?

Features:
  • Gaze input (no touch buttons needed)
  • Increasing difficulty level - the more viruses you kill, the more frequently they will spawn.
  • Atmospheric music and sounds
Requirements:
  • Android Phone with Android 4.4 (KitKat) or higher
  • Vr headset for Android (eg. Google Cardbard)
Controls:
  • Head Rotation
  • Gaze Input for UI (look at button ~1sek.) and virus kill (aim).
Instalation Guide
  1. Activate Developer mode on Android device
    1. Go to "Settings", then tap "About device" or "About phone"
    2. Scroll down, then tap "Build number" seven times.
    3. Enter your pattern, PIN or password to enable the Developer options menu.
    4. The "Developer options" menu will now appear in your Settings menu.
  2. Download APK file
  3. Tap Install
  4. Voila! Now You have game on Your smartphone :)

If you have any ideas how improve this game let me know in the comment. I will be glad to make better game experience for you.
